taxonomicnotes: The taxonomy and geographical distribution of Barbus jae are complex (Van den Bergh and Teugals 1998).
rationale: The species is widespread without major threats throughout central Africa and is assessed as Least Concern.
evaluator: Brummett, R., Mbe Tawe, A.N., Dening Touokong, C., Reid, G.M., Snoeks, J. Staissny, M., Moelants, T., Mamonekene, V., Ndodet, B., Ifuta, S.N.B., Chilala, A., Monsembula, R., Ibala Zamba, A., Opoye Itoua, O., Pouomogne, V., Darwall, W. & Smith, K.
